name: The Quest For The Golden Glizzy
name_original: The Quest For The Golden Glizzy
description: You play as Jerry the hotdog glutton. You are in hotdog hell for gluttony and have to escape by not falling (more accurate flying) of the face of the earth. You are a balloon if the balloon was hooked on meth. Dont fly off the earth. Also you can just skip 90% of the map
